name: Nick
body:
### About Me I am a student at Stony Brook University studying Computer Science and Applied Math. My interests of study include Big Data and High Performance Computing. I hope to solve interesting problems with applications in these fields either researching at a university or working with a company. ### Interests Electronics
Cars
### People I follow Bill Gates
Elon Musk
### Education Stony Brook University, Computer Science BS (May 2017)
Stony Brook University, Applied Math and Statistics BS (May 2017)
Stony Brook University, Computer Science MS (May 2018)
### Work Experience Research - Big Data Research
Worked in a lab researching spatial health analytics. I specifically worked on optimizing Nominatim RDBMS through database tuning so it can do home address to longitude latitude coordinate translation in a reasonable amount of time. Internship - Software Development
I worked at a software company that sells software to automotive dealerships. I worked with other interns to add a feature to a settings page. This was very involved because it required knowledge of many technologies. I worked on production level code which was shipped to the users. In order for the code to be shipped it had to pass all tests and had to be vetted by other employees. I learned the process of working with enterprise software.
### Languages Python
C
Java
SQL
### Libraries/Tools MPI
IBM DB2
### Skills Super Computing
Parallel Programming
RDBMS, NoSQL DB, Map Reduce DB
Operating Systems
### Awards University Scholar
Deans list for 4 semesters
Eagle Scout
